## MarkExtension.isEnabled() method

By default all marks extensions are set to be enabled. In your extension this can be overridden and set to false based on the context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isEnabled(_: ExtensionManagerMarkTypeParams): CommandStatusCheck;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_ | <code>ExtensionManagerMarkTypeParams</code> | see see  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`CommandStatusCheck`
